pages.text: $(bold)Item #:$() MCP-035$(br2)$(bold)Object Class:$() Block$(br2)$(bold)Special Containment Procedures:$() When not required in construction, store instances of MCP-035 on personage or safe-class containers in piles of no more than sixty-four (64). Any attempts to grow such piles beyond the limit have been impossible besides utilization

of specialized digital mass-energy storage systems. Instances of MCP-035-A are to be collected and contained in variable-size non-anomalous pens where there are no more than 25 instances per ground square meter.$(br2)$(bold)Description:$() MCP-035 is the collective designation of different but similar variations of the object. There are no more than 16 variations of MCP-035, but there are ██████████ known instances

of all variations of MCP-035, collectively. These instances only variate in color, and despite numerous instances, each object takes one of the sixteen (16) distinct colors, labeled between MCP-035-00 to MCP-035-15.

pages.title: MCP-035-A
pages.text: Instances of MCP-035-A are capable of producing, a count between one and three, one of
sixteen variations of MCP-035 involuntary using a pair of shears but will also drop a single instance of MCP-035 when terminated.

pages.title: MCP-035-0
pages.text: White variant of MCP-035, designated MCP-035-0.
